htmlbody:
The development of Participedia as resource for research is an on-going process. Please contact us with any suggestions for how this function of the platform could be improved. Any questions about the codebook or download function can be directed to [email protected].

New codebooks will be produced as necessary as we refine the data download function. These will always be dated.

Download codebook in PDF or Word format.

  • Participedia Case Data Codebook - 12 July 2013 (PDF 145Kb)
     
  • Participedia Case Data Codebook - 12 July 2013 (Docx 55Kb)
title: Download Case Data Codebook
